segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at the absurdity of this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, completely missing the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies like little thieves, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, and she’s just standing in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is balancing on that stool like a circus act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s face is priceless, just waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the kind of moment that makes life interesting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a comedy sketch waiting to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are going to get away with it, and that’s hilarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments I wish I had a camera for.
segments.speaker: PAR
